name: Vortex Rush (itch) (Mr.Meik, D_Lidz, Crius, aierou)
description: You are a streamer who was transported through a vortex. You need to escape the portal time-loop to get back to your stream! Collect power-ups to permanently increase your abilities.  Then make a dash for the keys and collect the vortex power-up to escape before your cycle resets again and you lose your keys.
